episodes.title: Episode #30.1
episodes.plot: Freddie, Chris and Paddy head to the Lake District for an emotional reunion with their own dads' old cars. Elsewhere, Chris heads out on the track to test Lamborghini's most powerful car ever, the hybrid Sian.

episodes.title: Episode #30.2
episodes.plot: The team try out some of James Bond's greatest cars, including the legendary Aston Martin DB5. Freddie and an Extreme E race car take on a man with a jet pack, while Chris and Paddy test a new Ferrari against a very old Alfa.

episodes.title: Episode #30.3
episodes.plot: Freddie, Chris and Paddy head out on an icy expedition across the wild Scottish Highlands in the new Land Rover Defender, Mercedes G-Wagen and Ariel Nomad. Which will prove itself the ultimate off-roader?

episodes.title: Episode #30.4
episodes.plot: Freddie, Chris and Paddy confront the male mid-life crisis by buying the perfect sports cars for 'gentlemen of a certain age'. Back at the track, Chris tests out the raucous new Toyota GR Yaris hot hatch.
